languages.text: {n}На морде ксеноса написано разочарование.{/n} "Болтун{mf||ья}. Все людишки — жалкие болтуны".
{n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."
languages.original_text: {n}На морде ксеноса написано разочарование.{/n} "Болтун{mf||ья}. Все людишки — жалкие болтуны".

traits.locale_text: {n}His does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "You talk big. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."
{n}His does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "You talk big. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."
{n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."
{n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."
{n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."

languages.text: {n}他毫不掩饰他的失望。{/n}“一刻不停地说，说，说。你们这些可悲的小人儿只擅长这个。”
languages.original_text: {n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."

traits.locale_text: {n}他毫不掩饰他的失望。{/n}“一刻不停地说，说，说。你们这些可悲的小人儿只擅长这个。”

languages.text: {n}No oculta su decepción.{/n} «Hablar, hablar y hablar. Es lo único que sabéis hacer los humanos».
languages.original_text: {n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."

traits.locale_text: {n}No oculta su decepción.{/n} «Hablar, hablar y hablar. Es lo único que sabéis hacer los humanos».

languages.text: {n}彼は明らかに失望している。{/n}「やはり口先だけか。人間とはいつもそうだ」
languages.original_text: {n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は明らかに失望している。{/n}「やはり口先だけか。人間とはいつもそうだ」

languages.text: {n}Er verbirgt seine Enttäuschung nicht.{/n} "Reden, reden, reden. Mehr könnt Ihr erbärmlichen Menschlinge nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er verbirgt seine Enttäuschung nicht.{/n} "Reden, reden, reden. Mehr könnt Ihr erbärmlichen Menschlinge nicht."

languages.text: {n}Il ne cache pas sa déception.{/n} « Toujours à bavasser... Les humains ne savent rien faire de mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}He does not hide his disappointment.{/n} "Talk, talk, talk. That's all you pathetic humanlings are good for."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il ne cache pas sa déception.{/n} « Toujours à bavasser... Les humains ne savent rien faire de mieux. »

languages.text: {n}Hayal kırıklığını gizlemiyor.{/n} "Bıdı bıdı bıdı. Zavallı insancıklar, tek bildiğiniz konuşmak."
